provisions.description: Constitution of Kenya (2010), Section 1 — sovereignty of the people and supremacy of the Constitution
provisions.expected_snippet: All sovereign power belongs to the people of Kenya

provisions.description: Constitution of Kenya (2010), Section 31 — right to privacy including the right not to have information relating to family or private affairs unnecessarily disclosed
provisions.expected_snippet: Every person has the right to privacy

provisions.description: Data Protection Act 2019, Section 2 — interpretation and definitions of key terms including personal data, data subject, data controller, and data processor
Computer Misuse and Cybercrimes Act 2018, Section 2 — interpretation and definitions for computer systems, data, and cybercrime offences
Companies Act 2015, Section 2 — interpretation and definitions for company types, directors, and corporate governance
Kenya Information and Communications Act, Section 2 — interpretation and definitions for telecommunications and ICT regulation
